meanings.definition: Resembling a corpse in being very thin, pale, or bony.
meanings.sent1: The cadaverous figure of the scarecrow sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The old haunted house had a cadaverous appearance that frightened the children.
meanings.sent3: The cadaverous Halloween decorations made the front yard look like a spooky graveyard.
meanings.sent4: Her cadaverous face reflected the harsh reality of her illness.
meanings.sent5: The cadaverous moon cast an eerie light over the cemetery.
